channel.title: Portforwarding
channel.description:
Yup, Its me again, the noob who can't code or anything on his own, So I'm coming to the pro's of the portforwarding.
Yes, I tried uTurrent. Yes, I went to my ip adress, allowed exceptions. Yes, I'm wi-fi. Yes, I am a noob. Yes, I need your help.
I have honestly tried everything, I've had about 6 friends, who all have there own server, try and help me, but they can't.
I'm using wi-fi on a windows xp, and it just won't work, noone can connect to my server, and its making me really sad.
I need my server up before Christmas, because I am moving, and I'm going to get a vps, so guys, please help, its really important, I'll try and pay you if you can help..
Pritchardthomas@yahoo.com or pm me, and We'll chat for a bit, and I may give you teamviewer Id and Pass.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2009, 09:05:31 pm[/size][hr]Noone, can help?

item.title: Portforwarding
